revised_title: Development of Broad-Spectrum Cephalosporins: A New Approach
tldr: Researchers developed a new approach to create broad-spectrum cephalosporins by introducing p-ketoacid moieties into the cephalosporin structure. This led to the creation of potent antibiotics, such as SCE-963 (cefotiam) and SCE-1365, which can control a wide range of pathogenic bacteria.
